name: Sprite Shape Generator
description:
A tool inspired by Shaun Spalding's lighting system video to define shapes in sprites and save them as simple coordinates in a text file in a very fast and easy way.

HOW TO USE

All you have to do is select a .png file from your computer and the game will import it in, after that, you can just simply click around its outline and save it once you're done, it'll open a .txt file with all the coordinates placed in one line ready to be copied and pasted into your projects.
